WorkItem.ClosedComment: Problem was with wowhead source parsing, should be fixed for next release.
WorkItem.Description: I was looking for frost emblem gear upgrades. With just frost emblems checked no new gear comes up. Optimize comes up blank. If I select other emblems the gear for those does show up.

Comments.Message: Please stop closing the issues. The supplied data source with 2.3.10 is wrong and doesnt update from wowhead nor armory.

Your source data is wrong, enable the parent 'Other' filter to get them to show up and refresh those items to get proper source data



** Closed by Jothay 2/24/2010 10:31 AM
Re-opening for further investigation.  Before closing this, ensure that you are trying that yourself with a DOWNLOADED RELEASE version of Rawr
Anything purchase with frost fails to show up.
I found a workaround.   Use ItemSource.xml from version 2.3.9

OK this is getting old.

If you get this message on your gear "drops from unknown boss in icecrwon...wowhead lacks data" refresh from Armoury (since wowhead has no/wrong data don't use it....duh).

Now the gear has number of Frost Emblems that it costs and the viola item shows on list when filtered by Frost emblem options. 

Solves this problem and the "Frost emblem fails" issues.

Please think about what you are doing and complaining about prior to posting issues and discussions.
Let me verify I understand Brituck...      If an item cost more emblems of frost then I have then it wont show up as an upgrade?

No, this is for the frost emblem items not being shown in the upgrade panel. This is the "permanent fix" for frost emblem items not showing up in 2.3.10, and it probably works with your 2.3.9 ItemSource.xml because that file was updated through the armoury.

But if you are using the cost prtion of optimize then you are correct. For example if i load frost costs and tell optimizer i want to spend less than 30 emblems, then i expect it to show no new gear since everything costs more than 30 emblems.
